document_data.name: ''Glow ring''
document_data.mainbody: A '''''glow ring''''' was a magical ring that gave off a soft glow, useful in nighttime thieving and other illicit activities.
document_data.Description: It was a [[silver]] ring set with an [[opal]]. A [[command word]] was typically inscribed within the band.
document_data.Powers: Activated and deactivated by the whispered command word, the opal radiated a cool, dim glow, similar to moonlight, to about {{SI|3|in|long=yes}}. It was enough to read by or perform detailed work, and could not be seen from far away. It did not work in magical ''[[darkness]]''.
document_data.Usage: The ''glow ring'' was made specifically for [[rogue]]s to open [[lock (item)|locks]] and conduct spying.
document_data.Notable owners: Several ''glow rings'' were known to exist in [[Faer√ªn]], typically in the possession of leaders of thieves' guilds. The master thief known as [[Silverfox]] had a ''glow ring''.
document_data.History: The [[Halruaa]]n mage [[Daltim Flamefist]] wrote details of the ''glow ring'' in his [[spellbook]] ''[[Daltim's Tome of Fire]]'', which he lost in [[Tethyr]] in the 1360s [[DR]].
